name: Star Jacker
overview: Only a true Star Jacker can tackle this mission! You are the leader of a squadron of space fighters. You have been ordered by your superiors to fly over alien territory and destroy their space bunkers, as well as their fleets of space drones. Destroy a space bunker and you can bypass the rest of the enemy installation and return to your transport ship. You start with a squadron of four fighters, and each time a fighter is destroyed, your squadron becomes smaller, and your firepower is reduced as a result. How long can you survive against the increasingly aggresive alien forces, in this challenging adaptation of the Sega arcade game?
